sentences.english: The dissertation consists of introduction and four parts.
sentences.chinese: 全文分爲緒論和四個主要章節。

sentences.english: The following is the text of Senator Clinton's letter today to the Secretary of the Army.
sentences.chinese: 全文如下參議員克林頓的一封信，今天陸軍大臣。

sentences.english: Create full-text indexes on databases that are searched regularly.
sentences.chinese: 在需要定期進行搜索的數據庫上創建全文索引。

sentences.english: We now bring you the full text of the Renmin Ribao editorial.
sentences.chinese: 現在全文廣播《人民日報》社論。

sentences.english: The solemn statement was featured in full in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 各報全文刊登了這一莊嚴的聲明。

sentences.english: Chapter 4: summarizes the whole dissertation and gives some expectation for future research.
sentences.chinese: 第四章總結全文並對未來進行了一些展望。

sentences.english: Besides preface and final words, the thesis consists of 3 chapters, about 50,000 Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 除序言和結語外，全文共三章，計5萬餘字。
第五部分是對全文的總結。

sentences.english: Chapter Three gives the theoretical framework for the present study based on the Linguistic Adaptation Theory (Verschueren, 2000).
sentences.chinese: 第三章在語言順應論的基礎上提出了全文的理論框架。

sentences.english: The dissertation is divided to four chapters.
sentences.chinese: 全文共分爲四章，約五萬字。

sentences.english: For old canonical works, full text is generally available, often in multiple formats.
sentences.chinese: 在老的權威作品中，常以多種格式提供全文。

sentences.english: Update and full-text indexing were also enabled.
sentences.chinese: 同時還啓用了更新和全文索引。

sentences.english: In the full-text index example above, this identifier would be the index name.
sentences.chinese: 在上面的全文索引示例中，這個標識符是索引名稱。

sentences.english: At last , it devises the theoretic summarization to the whole-length discussion.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對全文的論述進行了理論上的總結。

sentences.english: Displays the system-specified name for this full-text index.
sentences.chinese: 顯示此全文索引的系統指定名稱。

definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
entire book/unabridged book/entire multi-volume work/comprehensive volume
sheet/piece of writing/bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old)/classifier for written items: chapter, article
writing style (formal)/to send an official written communication
